mapper.select: select id, name, age, birth_date, ethnicity, account, password, education, experience, specialties, assigned_elders, created_at, updated_at from care_workers order by updated_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into care_workers(name, age, birth_date, ethnicity, account, password, education, experience, specialties, assigned_elders, created_at, updated_at) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{birthDate}, #{ethnicity}, #{account}, #{password}, #{education}, #{experience}, #{specialties}, #{assignedElders}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select id, name, age, birth_date, ethnicity, account, password, education, experience, specialties, assigned_elders, created_at, updated_at from care_workers where id = #{id}
